com.qtplaf.library.trading.data

Class Instrument

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.trading.data.Instrument

  • public class Instrument
extends java.lang.Object
    Financial instrument definition.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String description
      Instrument description.
      private java.lang.String id
      Instrument unique identifier or code.
      private int pipScale
      The scale of a pip.
      private double pipValue
      The value of a pip, e.g. 0.0001 for the currency pair EUR/USD.
      private java.util.Currency primaryCurrency
      Primary currency.
      private java.util.Currency secondaryCurrency
      Secondary currency.
      private int tickScale
      The tick or minimum value scale.
      private double tickValue
      Tick value, e.g., 0.00001 for the currency pair EUR/USD.
      private int volumeScale
      The volume scale.

                  int tickScale,

        Constructor assigning the fields.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier or code.
        description - Description.
        primaryCurrency - The primary currency code.
        secondaryCurrency - The secondary currency code.
        pipValue - Pip value.
        pipScale - The pip scale.
        tickValue - Tick or minimum value.
        tickScale - Tick scale.
        volumeScale - The volume scale if applicable, otherwise -1.
